title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Superstition Foothills, Arizona
content:
Photo submitted by Dave Anjos, “This was taken March 24th in a late afternoon ride at the Superstition Mountain Foothills near Phoenix. Cool temps, cloud cover, and moist dirt made for a great ride.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers aroundÂ the world […]
